EmailTemplate.subject: Epic mixes at Hyde Bar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
Epic mixes at Hyde Bar
Hyde Bar’s very own mixologist, Jason Julian, will teach you how to create the most divine cocktails using Martell’s finest drops.
Join him and the Martell brand ambassador for a free and exclusive 30-seat mixology full of unforgettable twists and tastes -- definitely reserved for the intensely curious.
May 18, 2017 / 9 p.m.
HYDE at 53M
53, Jalan SS 21/1a, Damansara Utama,
47400 Petaling Jaya
<[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/MYA_BRD_MRT_1704_BeCuriosWorkshop_Page---Registration.html?FirstName={{lead.First Name}}&LastName={{lead.Last Name}}&Email={{lead.Email Address}}]]>
